div.p: We offer a complete range of beauty treatments for nails, hair, face and body—allowing you to shine even brighter
We offer a complete range of beauty treatments for nails, hair, face and body—allowing you to shine even brighter

div.h1: It all began as a nail studio
div.p: Where we dedicated ourselves to perfecting the art of nail care. Specializing in “russian manicure & pedicure” technique, our mission was to provide top-notch nail services that left our clients feeling pampered and confident. We were committed to quality, precision, and ensuring that every visit to our studio was a delightful experience.

div.h1: But we listened, and we heard your dreams
div.p: You craved a place where beauty and wellness unite, where you could find everything you need under one roof.
Today, we proudly introduce our second branch located in the heart of the city - Dubai Mall Zabeel Expansion.

div.h1: But we listened, and we heard your dreams
div.p: You craved a place where beauty and wellness unite, where you could find everything you need under one roof.

div.h1: It's not just about nails anymore
div.p: We call it our “beauty cave” - it's about complete beauty, from head to toe. We offer a full range of services, all designed to enhance your natural beauty and elevate your spirit.

div.h1: Beauty Studio is a celebration of you

div.p: Your support, your loyalty, and your smiles brought us here. Join us in this new chapter of your beauty journey.

img.alt: Luxurious interior of the salon with cosmetics samples on the shelves
point of service in the salon
point of service in the salon

div.p: Our specialists are already prepared to assist you with beauty procedures and immerse you in hours of exceptional self-care.
Our specialists are already prepared to assist you with beauty procedures and immerse you in hours of exceptional self-care.
Our works stand as a testament to our expertise, whether in nail services, hair treatments, facial and body care, or lash and brow enhancements.
I am really satisfied with your salon, it is very clean and tidy and the staff are very kind, especially Mrs. Anna.

Larisa is a very good and professional hairstylist and I have been trusting her with my hair for over 10 years ever since she was working in Bawabat Al Sharq mall branch. She’s a beautiful and a very nice person. She’s the best in haircuts!

Wonderful service. I was very delighted with the attention I received and how they attended to me on the spot. Will recommend this place to my friends. Thank you ladies! Especially to my hairdresser! ❤️
